assessment_template_create_payload.title: CS Readiness Assessment
assessment_template_create_payload.description: This 16-point assessment helps organizations evaluate client readiness across four core dimensions critical to long-term success: strategic engagement, operational maturity, relationship strength, and growth potential. It is designed to uncover where clients are poised for strategic growth and where friction may exist in execution or collaboration.

categories.title: Strategic Engagement
categories.description: Evaluates client alignment, participation, and willingness to plan beyond tickets. High scores reflect partner-level relationships.

questions.title: Business Planning & Outcome Alignment
questions.description: Combines visibility into business goals with openness to budget planning and ROI-focused outcomes.
questions.remediation_tips: Use QBRs to position technology as a business enabler. Connect IT recommendations to revenue, risk, or productivity.

criteria.description: Goals and budgets are not shared or discussed
Some vague or tactical planning occurs

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate whether the client shares business priorities, engages in forward planning, and seeks business value.

questions.title: Engagement in Strategic Conversations
questions.description: Combines QBR participation, follow-through, and proactive strategic dialogue beyond support.
questions.remediation_tips: Elevate QBR content to business outcomes. Invite decision-makers and track follow-through.
questions.scoring_instructions: Look at meeting attendance, post-QBR execution, and types of questions clients ask.

questions.title: Willingness to Embrace Change with Justification
questions.description: Measures client openness to recommendations and their ability to articulate business value.
questions.remediation_tips: Frame changes in business terms. Build trust through small wins before major initiatives.

criteria.description: Resistant to change or no business case
Open to change with clear business reasoning

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess how clients respond to recommendations and whether they can articulate value.

questions.title: Long-term Partnership Mindset
questions.description: Evaluates whether the client views you as a strategic partner versus a vendor.
questions.remediation_tips: Demonstrate strategic value beyond technical support. Share industry insights and business outcomes.

criteria.description: Views MSP as strategic business partner

questions.scoring_instructions: Look for signs of strategic thinking, long-term planning, and partnership language.

categories.title: Operational Maturity
categories.description: Assesses client infrastructure, processes, and operational readiness for strategic initiatives.

questions.title: Infrastructure Documentation Quality
questions.description: Evaluates the completeness and accuracy of network documentation, asset inventories, and process documentation.
questions.remediation_tips: Offer documentation services. Use discovery tools to build comprehensive inventories.
questions.scoring_instructions: Review network diagrams, asset lists, and process documentation for completeness.

questions.title: Change Management Process
questions.description: Assesses whether the client has formal change management procedures and follows them consistently.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement change management framework. Train staff on procedures and track compliance.

criteria.description: No formal process or ad-hoc changes

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate change request procedures, approval workflows, and testing protocols.

questions.title: Backup and Disaster Recovery
questions.description: Assesses the robustness of backup systems, recovery procedures, and business continuity planning.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement comprehensive backup strategy. Test recovery procedures regularly.
questions.scoring_instructions: Review backup coverage, retention policies, and recovery testing frequency.

questions.title: Security Posture and Compliance
questions.description: Evaluates security controls, compliance status, and overall security maturity.
questions.remediation_tips: Implement security framework. Conduct regular assessments and gap analysis.

criteria.description: Significant security gaps or compliance issues

questions.scoring_instructions: Review security controls, compliance requirements, and recent assessments.

categories.title: Relationship Strength
categories.description: Measures the quality of communication, trust, and collaboration between the MSP and client.

questions.title: Communication Quality and Frequency
questions.description: Evaluates the effectiveness of communication channels, response times, and information sharing.
questions.remediation_tips: Establish communication protocols. Use multiple channels and regular check-ins.
questions.scoring_instructions: Assess response times, communication clarity, and information sharing.

questions.title: Trust and Transparency
questions.description: Measures the level of trust, transparency, and openness in the relationship.
questions.remediation_tips: Build trust through consistent delivery. Share insights and be transparent about challenges.

criteria.description: Low trust or lack of transparency

questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate information sharing, problem-solving approach, and relationship dynamics.

questions.title: Collaboration and Teamwork
questions.description: Assesses how well the MSP and client teams work together on projects and initiatives.
questions.remediation_tips: Foster collaborative culture. Include client teams in planning and decision-making.

criteria.description: Some collaboration with room for improvement

questions.scoring_instructions: Review project collaboration, team interactions, and joint problem-solving.

questions.title: Feedback and Continuous Improvement
questions.description: Evaluates the client's willingness to provide feedback and participate in improvement initiatives.
questions.remediation_tips: Solicit regular feedback. Implement improvement processes and track progress.

criteria.description: No feedback or resistance to improvement

questions.scoring_instructions: Assess feedback frequency, improvement participation, and process refinement.

categories.title: Growth Potential
categories.description: Evaluates opportunities for expanding services, increasing revenue, and deepening the relationship.

questions.title: Service Expansion Opportunities
questions.description: Identifies potential areas for adding new services or expanding existing ones.
questions.remediation_tips: Conduct service gap analysis. Present opportunities aligned with client needs.
questions.scoring_instructions: Review current services, client needs, and expansion opportunities.

questions.title: Budget and Investment Capacity
questions.description: Assesses the client's financial capacity and willingness to invest in technology and services.
questions.remediation_tips: Understand budget cycles and constraints. Present ROI-focused proposals.
questions.scoring_instructions: Evaluate budget discussions, investment history, and financial capacity.

questions.title: Market Position and Industry Trends
questions.description: Assesses how well-positioned the client is to capitalize on industry trends and market opportunities.
questions.remediation_tips: Share industry insights. Help clients understand market positioning and opportunities.

criteria.description: Poor market position or declining industry
Stable position with some growth potential

questions.scoring_instructions: Review market position, industry trends, and growth opportunities.

questions.title: Strategic Alignment and Vision
questions.description: Evaluates alignment between client's strategic vision and MSP's capabilities and offerings.
questions.remediation_tips: Understand client vision and goals. Align services with strategic objectives.
questions.scoring_instructions: Assess strategic goals, vision alignment, and long-term planning.
